name: FARM PROJECT (unfinished prototype)
description:
When I first started making visual novels in Renpy, I had the idea of making a game inspired by clicker type games and harvest moon, and started working on FARM PROJECT.  

It was meant to be a resource management game where you grew crops, mined for ores, and chopped wood, all of which would allow you to construct buildings, build new tools and attracted new villagers to your town who you could befriend and maybe marry. I also wanted to capture the feeling of getting to explore and expansive map and see it change over seasons, and as new villagers arrived. 

Unfortunately... It's kind of boring! There's way too much clicking involved.  Clicking to get resources, clicking to travel the map... And unlike most clicker games, there's not really an idle aspect to the game, which would allow the character to explore the world without losing out on building resources. It just wasn't very rewarding to me!

Still, I have this prototype made, which has a few buildings put in, some crops that grow overtime, as well as a crude day/afternoon/night system. 

Check it out if you're interested!

I'd like to revisit this idea in the future, but not likely with this game.
